jobDescription: Oversees the acquisition, analysis and dissemination of subject matter knowledge.  Conducts high level business analysis involving complex business requirements and processes.  Analyzes current processes and recommends process improvements.  Provides technical and business knowledge to clients. Keeps abreast of technological and competitive developments.  Conducts research on industry practices and standards and other benchmarking data.  Develops position statements on complex subject matter questions. Minimum Job Specs: Bachelor's Degree in technology, finance, business or equivalent, 8 years of related financial services experience, Extensive knowledge of business functions, Experience with project management methodology, Excellent analytical skills, Very strong relationship management skills, Strong writing and presentation skills  SOX Testing Experience,  Archer Experience,  Strong BA Skills,
